= Response Times Distribution <sup><font color=gray size="1">since 0.4.0</font></sup>=

This graph will display the response time distribution of the test. The X axis shows the response times grouped by interval, and the Y axis the number of samples which are contained in each interval.

== Sample result ==

[/img/wiki/response_times_distribution.png]

== Online Version ==

An online version of aggregated response times distribution is available on [https://loadosophia.org/?utm_source=jpgc&utm_medium=wiki&utm_campaign=RTD Loadosophia.org] service, see [https://loadosophia.org/examples/80738/?utm_source=jpgc&utm_medium=wiki&utm_campaign=RTD#tab=1&zoom=0 example].
